description:
Panty and Stocking use a wicked assortment of sex toys to eradicate an army of the undead. When the dust settles, the foul-mouthed sisters find themselves on trial for ghost murder with a monkey for an attorney!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ... of the Dead / Ippiki no Okoreru Ghost
...オブ・ザ・デッド / 一匹の怒れるゴースト
...오브 더 데드 / 한 마리의 두려워하는 고스트
